Description of incident: A former Detroit Medical Center-Harper University Hospital employee was found with the personal information of 1,087 patients by West Bloomfield police. The documents included patients health information, names, dates of birth, reasons for patient visits and Social Security numbers.When the hospital learned of the breach they immediately revoked the employee's access to its computer systems and all of the Detroit Medical Center hospitals.For patients that were affected they can call 1-855-830-9731 with questions.
